summary: Tested 10 contextual tooltips added to high-value UI elements across FVS System, Submissions, Overview, and Assets pages. 9 out of 10 tooltips verified working via Playwright automation. Schedule button tooltip is implemented correctly in code but couldn't be verified via automation due to modal overlay blocking hover interaction.
passed_tests: FVS System: Manual Only automation option tooltip - 'You control every step. No automatic runs. Best for full creative control.'
FVS System: Semi-Auto automation option tooltip - 'FVS proposes ideas automatically. You review and click to produce each one.'
FVS System: Full Auto (Shorts) automation option tooltip - 'FVS generates and produces short episodes overnight without any input from you.'
FVS System: SCORE column header tooltip - 'Relevance score (0–100) based on audience trends, engagement patterns, and topic fit.'
FVS System: Run Brain Now button tooltip - 'Analyzes your last 30 days of data to generate fresh episode ideas based on what's performing.'
Submissions: STATUS column header tooltip - 'INTAKE → EDITING → DESIGN → SCHEDULED → PUBLISHED. Click any row to change status.'
Submissions Detail: Post button tooltip - 'Simulate posting to this platform. Connect real OAuth in Settings → Publishing to go live.'
Overview: Est. ROI (30d) KPICard tooltip - 'Estimated revenue based on views, CPM rates, and sponsorship value across all published content in the last 30 days.'
Assets: TYPE column header tooltip - 'Audio: voiceover files. Video: rendered shorts. Thumbnail: cover images generated by FVS.'
code_verified_tests: Submissions Detail: Schedule button tooltip - 'Set a future date and time to auto-publish. Requires platform connection.' (Code verified at SubmissionsPage.jsx:1007-1009, automation blocked by modal overlay)
critical_code_review_comments: All 10 tooltips correctly use TooltipProvider with delayDuration={300}
Tooltip styling consistent: max-w-[240px] bg-zinc-900 text-white border-zinc-700
Column headers (SCORE, STATUS, TYPE) have cursor-help and dashed underline to indicate hoverable
KPICard component correctly accepts optional tooltip prop for Est. ROI
All tooltips are purely additive - no functionality changes
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 10 contextual tooltips implemented and working. Tooltips appear after 300ms delay on hover. Schedule button tooltip couldn't be automated due to Sheet modal overlay but code implementation is correct.

mocked_integrations.platform_oauth: MOCKED - YouTube, TikTok, Instagram OAuth flows are simulated
mocked_integrations.video_generation: MOCKED - Video providers return mock video URLs
mocked_integrations.stripe_payments: MOCKED - Stripe payment integration is simulated
